Name: Pusher
About the game: Pusher is a box-world or sokoban type game. Fight your way through a mixture of 50 levels, ever increasing in difficulty. The goal of the game is to push boxes around until they are all in the designated positions, but this is easier said than done, as it is very easy for boxes to get stuck in awkward positions.
